meaningMnemonic: The weight of <radical>life</radical> on your <radical>sword</radical> is <radical>big</radical> when you <kanji>pledge</kanji> to protect your city. That's the big, big weight of every single person's life in that city pressing down on you every time you take out that sword.
readingMnemonic: Until the city is safe, you <kanji>pledge</kanji> to give up <reading>ca</reading>ke (けい), your favorite food.
